chartbeat.title: NCAAM College Basketball Scores - NCAAM Scoreboard - ESPN

content.description: Real-time NCAAM College Basketball scores on ESPN
content.keywords: NCAAM Scores, NCAAM scoreboard, College Basketball Scores, College Basketball scoreboard

headlines.description: Miles Bridges scored 19 points, Joshua Langford had 16 and No. 2 Michigan State beat Illinois 81-61 on Tuesday night, sealing a share of the Big Ten championship.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 2 Michigan St tops Illinois 81-61, seals share of title

video.headline: Michigan State cruises on senior night

headlines.description: C.J. Jackson scored 18 points to help No. 16 Ohio State rout Rutgers 79-52 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jackson scores 18 as No. 16 Ohio State routs Rutgers 79-52

video.headline: Ohio State gets easy W on senior night

headlines.description: Jeff Dowtin scored 23 points, including four key free throws in the final seconds, as Rhode Island clinched a share of the Atlantic 10 regular season title with a hard-fought 95-93 overtime victory at La Salle on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: URI fights off La Salle for share of A-10 title

video.headline: Rhode Island edges La Salle in OT

headlines.description: Jevon Carter and Esa Ahmad both scored 15 points as No. 21 West Virginia beat Baylor 71-60 on Tuesday night, ending the Bears' five-game winning streak that had been the longest in the Big 12 Conference.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 21 West Virginia 71-60 win ends Baylor's 5-game streak

headlines.description: Freshman Braxton Beverly scored 16 points with five first-half 3-pointers, helping North Carolina State beat Boston College 82-66 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: NC State beats Boston College 82-66 for 3rd straight win

headlines.description: Abdul Ado scored 19 points and Mississippi State stunned Texas A&M 93-81 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mississippi State stuns Texas A&M 93-81

headlines.description: Kelan Martin hit five of Butler's 14 3-pointers and finished with 26 points to lead the Bulldogs to a 93-70 win over Creighton on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Martin scores 26 as Butler cruises past Creighton 93-70

headlines.description: Francis Alonso scored 24 and James Dickey finished with a double-double to propel UNC Greensboro to a 76-66 victory over Wofford on Tuesday night for its fourth straight win.
headlines.shortLinkText: UNC Greensboro tops Wofford 76-66 for 4th straight win

headlines.description: Zane Najdawi scored 24 points, including a late tie-breaking 3-pointer, and Frankie Johnson hit four free throws in the final 17 seconds to help The Citadel beat East Tennessee State 84-82 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Najdawi hits late 3, scores 24; The Citadel beats ETSU 84-82

headlines.description: Demetre Rivers had 24 points and Ross Cummings added 19 as Mercer won its sixth straight Southern Conference game, blowing past Western Carolina 81-64 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rivers, Cummings lead Mercer to 6th straight win

headlines.description: Jimond Ivey drove into the middle of the lane to hit a floater and Lucas Smith added a free throw in the final seconds as Akron upset Bowling Green 81-79 in Mid-American Conference action on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ivey hits late jumper as Akron upsets Bowling  Green 81-79

headlines.description: Jordan Dartis sank half of his 10 3-point attempts and scored 20 to lead six players in double figures and Ohio won back-to-back Mid-American Conference games for the first time this season with an 88-76 victory over Kent State on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dartis sparks Ohio to 88-76 win over Kent State

headlines.description: James Thompson IV and Elijah Minnie each scored 23 points and Paul Jackson had 18 points and 10 assists to help Eastern Michigan beat Toledo 85-79 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Thompson IV, Minnie help Eastern Michigan beat Toledo 85-79

headlines.description: Trey Moses had 23 points, 12 rebounds and three blocks, Tahjai Teague was one rebound shy of a double-double and Ball State beat Northern Illinois 77-68 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ball State beats NIU 77-68, keeps pace in MAC West

headlines.description: Thomas Wilder scored 11 of his 22 points in overtime, completing a 3-point play in the final seconds to seal the win, as Western Michigan struggled to get past Central Michigan 83-81 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wilder leads W. Michigan to 83-81 OT win over C. Michigan

headlines.description: Nike Sibande scored 21 points, freshman Isaiah Coleman-Lands added 17 points with five 3-pointers -- both season highs -- and Miami (Ohio) beat Mid-American Conference-leader Buffalo 84-81 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Miami (Ohio) knocks off MAC-leading Buffalo 84-81

headlines.description: James Palmer scored 15 points Tuesday night as Nebraska beat Indiana 66-57, allowing the Huskers the resume their NCAA Tournament pursuit.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palmer leads Nebraska to 66-57 win over Indiana

video.headline: Nebraska's bench goes all-in on celebrations

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Nebraska's bench goes all-in on celebrations) 2018/02/20 ESHEET

headlines.description: Breein Tyree scored 25 points, including a game-tying basket in regulation, and Ole Miss defeated Missouri 90-87 in overtime Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tyree leads Ole Miss past Missouri 90-87 in overtime

headlines.description: Kevin Knox scored 23 points and Kentucky used a 31-11 run to end the game to win its second straight with an 87-72 victory over Arkansas on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Knox leads Kentucky's second-half surge in win at Arkansas

video.headline: Kentucky rolls in second half, tops Arkansas

headlines.description: Tremont Waters had 28 points and nine assists, and LSU beat Vanderbilt 88-78 on Tuesday night to keep the Commodores winless on the road.
headlines.shortLinkText: Waters scores 28, LSU beats Vanderbilt 88-78

headlines.description: Spencer Haldeman drained a late trey to give Northern Iowa enough cushion to hold off Valparaiso 68-63 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Haldeman's late 3 helps Northern Iowa hold off Valparaiso

headlines.description: Trey Landers scored 13 points, grabbed eight rebounds and made key plays down the stretch to help Dayton rally from a 13-point second-half deficit on Tuesday night to beat Saint Louis 53-50.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dayton rallies from 13-point deficit, tops Saint Louis 53-50

headlines.description: Sam Logwood and Troy Simons scored 24 points apiece as New Mexico held off a late Wyoming surge for a 119-114 victory on Tuesday night to take sole possession of fourth place in the Mountain West Conference standings.
headlines.shortLinkText: Logwood, Simons lead New Mexico to 119-114 win over Wyoming

nowFeed.headline: This is going to be a rough wait until Selection Sunday for Saint Mary's. Their at-large resume is basically one win at Gonzaga, a gaudy record (including a great record away from home) and very solid predictive/quality metrics.
nowFeed.story: This is going to be a rough wait until Selection Sunday for Saint Mary's. Their at-large resume is basically one win at Gonzaga, a gaudy record (including a great record away from home) and very solid predictive/quality metrics.

nowFeed.headline:
Arkansas senior Dustin Thomas has been dismissed from the team, effective immediately, for a violation of team rules. 

Has played at least 18 minutes in 12 of the Razorbacks' last 15 games.
nowFeed.story:
Arkansas senior Dustin Thomas has been dismissed from the team, effective immediately, for a violation of team rules. 

Has played at least 18 minutes in 12 of the Razorbacks' last 15 games.

nowFeed.headline: After a couple of upsets en route to its Big Ten title, Michigan has jumped up to 14th in BPI's latest rankings. Florida also a big mover in the last week.
nowFeed.story: After a couple of upsets en route to its Big Ten title, Michigan has jumped up to 14th in BPI's latest rankings. Florida also a big mover in the last week.

nowFeed.headline: John Beilein said several teams that made deep March runs have had this type of long layoff in the past  and winning a title game at Madison Square Garden balances it out. "To play in front of that crowd, that's a once in a lifetime experience. It's worth the wait."
nowFeed.story: John Beilein said several teams that made deep March runs have had this type of long layoff in the past  and winning a title game at Madison Square Garden balances it out. "To play in front of that crowd, that's a once in a lifetime experience. It's worth the wait."

nowFeed.headline: There might not be a hotter team nationally right now than Michigan. Nine straight wins for the Wolverines, back-to-back Big Ten tournament titles.
nowFeed.story: There might not be a hotter team nationally right now than Michigan. Nine straight wins for the Wolverines, back-to-back Big Ten tournament titles.

nowFeed.headline: Nojel Eastern has had some moments this week for Purdue. Has been very good defensively, his size causing some problems for Tony Carr yesterday, being used on Zavier Simpson today. Also has six points today.
nowFeed.story: Nojel Eastern has had some moments this week for Purdue. Has been very good defensively, his size causing some problems for Tony Carr yesterday, being used on Zavier Simpson today. Also has six points today.

nowFeed.headline:
Michigan's Jon Teske has 12 points in 10 minutes so far today. 

In Michigan's last 11 games, Jon Teske had scored a combined 19 points.

nowFeed.headline: Battle of the big men so far here at Madison Square Garden. Isaac Haas has all seven points for Purdue; Moe Wagner and Jon Teske combining for all nine for Michigan.
nowFeed.story: Battle of the big men so far here at Madison Square Garden. Isaac Haas has all seven points for Purdue; Moe Wagner and Jon Teske combining for all nine for Michigan.

nowFeed.headline: Radford was picked seventh in the Big South preseason polls. They finished as the two seed. Now they are going dancing! Radford Big South Champions.
nowFeed.story: Radford was picked seventh in the Big South preseason polls. They finished as the two seed. Now they are going dancing! Radford Big South Champions.

nowFeed.headline: At one point this season Arizona State was ranked No. 3 in the AP poll. Now, after losing to Stanford yesterday, the Sun Devils have just a 23% chance to reach the NCAA tournament, per BPI.

nowFeed.headline:
I followed Grayson Allen closely since his high school days. A fierce  competitor who gave it his all. He never had one issue on or off the court. I called Duke's game last year when Grayson Allen had his tripping incident. Tonight on senior night in a win over North Carolina I loved listening to Maria Taylor's post-game interview with Allen. 
What does Duke mean to you? 
" It means everything to me, it's my love and my passion. " Allen said. 
I call that growing up.
nowFeed.story:
I followed Grayson Allen closely since his high school days. A fierce  competitor who gave it his all. He never had one issue on or off the court. I called Duke's game last year when Grayson Allen had his tripping incident. Tonight on senior night in a win over North Carolina I loved listening to Maria Taylor's post-game interview with Allen. 
What does Duke mean to you? 
" It means everything to me, it's my love and my passion. " Allen said. 
I call that growing up.

nowFeed.headline: When asked to put into words the week that was, Arizona Head Coach Sean Miller used "devastating" and "remarkable."  U of A clinched the PAC-12 regular season title with a 66-54 victory over California.

nowFeed.headline: Duke trails by 3, but it's been a night of missed opportunities - and shots - for the Blue Devils. They are 1-8 from behind the arc, including this shot, which feel about six inches short.
